page.title: 03MISS HAND
page.content:
Miss Hand {:::::::::::}
Miss Hand is one of the village's oldest inhabitants.She was born in Shelton (a nearby village) in{1900.} She lived there for{six}years then she moved to East Bridgford.She started school when she was{4}years old in Shelton then she came to East Bridgford where she left school when she was{12.}She used to help her mum in her spare time. They didn't have any water so they had to get it from a well. They had no lighting or heating so they had to use an oil lamp for lighting. They didn't have a television or radio. One of her jobs was working for Arthur Du Boulay Hill who wrote a book about East Bridgford.
